attributes.action: listen to the views of parents of Abbeydale Grange and other secondary schools in SW of Sheffield, to ensure that Sheffield City Council cannot close Abbeydale Grange and disperse its students across those other  SW schools, resulting in monstrous class sizes of 35+ and causing health and safety issues, meaning danger for our children and a detrimental effect on their education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that you listen to the views of parents of Abbeydale Grange and other secondary schools in SW of Sheffield, to ensure that Sheffield City Council cannot close Abbeydale Grange and disperse its students across those other  SW schools, resulting in monstrous class sizes of 35+ and causing health and safety issues, meaning danger for our children and a detrimental effect on their education.
